title: WATCH: You have never seen TV star Karan Patel like this before! : Soaps, News - India Today
text:
WATCH: You have never seen TV star Karan Patel like this before! The actor will soon be seen in a brand new avatar on the show Yeh Hai Mohabbatein. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Anvita Singh A + A - TV actor Karan Patel. Picture courtesy: Instagram/karan9198 
Ekta Kapoor's popular drama Yeh Hai Mohabbatein has kept its fans glued to the show by introducing new twists and turns in the serial. And in an upcoming episode of the show, the soap's lead actor Karan Patel, popularly known by his screen name Raman Bhalla, will be seen in a brand new avatar. 
Also read: Yeh Hai Mohabbatein's Karan Patel posts a sweet message for actress-wife Ankita Bhargava 
The actor will be seen in a new look, apparently inspired by Kamal Haasan's Chachi 420 style. A video posted by Karan Patel (@karan9198) on Feb 7, 2017 at 9:25pm PST Karan, who will be seen as Gulabo in the show, took to social media site Instagram to thank his producer Ekta Kapoor and the creative heads for the character. 
He shared a promo featuring 'Gulabo' and wrote, "@ektaravikapoor , Ektaaa le aa gayi teri #Gulabo! Thank you and love you for giving me this wonderful opportunity to do something that's never been done in such a big show, ppl wait n watch!!" 
We never thought we would say this, but Karan makes a lovely woman, doesn't he? For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
